Title: Sparks
Plot: The crew decide to save some children from a disabled school bus as they go to call in Harlem. However, the soon meet up with an upset Rev. Al Sharpton. Franco finally realizes why Alicia is so interested in him. Mike and his roommate discuss their sexuality. Sean ends up telling Tommy about his feelings for Maggie. Sheila has a proposal for Tommy. Janet wants to talk to him about their settlement, but with no lawyers involved.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Al Sharpton,  Paulina Gerzon,  Susan Sarandon,  Paige Turco,  Tommy  Nelson,  Chris Bowers,  Timothy Adams,  Subhash Mandal,  Sam Breslin Wright,  Marisa Echeverria,  Lauren Potter,  Amy Raudenbush
